message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm on a budget.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but $80 is quite low. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $120 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
